content.en: Cloud workload prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to predict cloud workload and improve resource management in cloud computing. These algorithms, such as deep learning models and neural networks, are being developed to accurately forecast cloud datacenter networks' workload, enhance workload prediction for cloud providers, and improve resource management at cloud data centers. By leveraging machine learning techniques, these algorithms aim to optimize cloud services and address challenges in workload anticipation and resource allocation.
content.da: Forudsigelse af cloud-arbejdsbelastning: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forudsige cloud-arbejdsbelastning og forbedre ressourcehåndtering i cloud computing. Disse algoritmer, såsom dyb læringsmodeller og neurale netværk, udvikles for nøjagtigt at kunne forudsige arbejdsbelastningen i cloud-datacenternettverk, forbedre arbejdsbelastningsforudsigelser for cloud-udbydere og forbedre ressourcehåndtering i cloud-datacentre. Ved at udnytte maskinlæringsteknikker har disse algoritmer til formål at optimere cloud-tjenester og adressere udfordringer i arbejdsbelastningsantagelser og ressourceallokering.
